Header.title: Welcome to The Resource-X
Header.paragraph: One Stop Destination for all your study needs. Every resource related to college would be available here

About.paragraph: We are a team of Enthusiatic individuals who are here to help you with all college related stuffs. You would find all resources like notes, tutorials, papers, books at this website.If you need any help, we are always there for you.Just mail us or connect with us by sending your feedback to us in form below. Happy ExploringðŸ˜Š
